channel.title: Skillcape emotes
channel.description:
ok ive been working on adding skillcape emotes to my v3 client =p
just wanted to show you guys what ive got done so far..
quest cape =] [would be cool if i new how to make player fly and spin] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/140m1yp.jpg[/img]
post what you guys think ill be updating this for each emote i finish
please post or i will remove i mean if i get like 2k veiws and 1 post that means you guys dont care for this and i will remove.. i will post tutorials after i get all the emotes added so post or no tuts on skillcape emotes =p

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Guys, check the date of the topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

Ah nice work, i love it if ppl figure out some ways to get an costom but still nice emote

I did it myself to and i recomand you to use the ags spec emote for quests and ofc the gfx, i used that in my server, it looks sweet. Also use the anims AND original gfx, these are already released.

And some others:

You could make smit like this:

Add the anim and the gfx.
Then add the smith emote with a hammer, easy as hell.
Same with fishing and so on.
Wc same story.

For fm you could get the fire gfx nd anim and get some emote where your char pulls up his hands, not so hard.

For strength i used the gfx (no anim) and the veng emote, isnt that bad.

I think i might post a lil vid of some emotes

But the emotes like deff will be almost impossible.

I hope to see some more ideas, becoz im also looking for a few ones i didnt really figure out yet.
And im hoping sum1 is releasing those emotes -.-

Peace.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @xD3ad xD3ad
item.description:
@xD3ad wrote:

[quote=“moparclient, post:24, topic:183217”][quote author=xD3ad link=topic=244891.msg3057857#msg3057857 date=1260638507]
Lol nice, grats to you for figuring out but it isnt the proper skillcape emote.
Animation = already in server.
GFX = fail gfx of Project Fubergen’s client in darkbow spec. here’s code for the damn thing.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“questcape”) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2740) //selfexplain.
{
stillgfx(643, absY, absX); // fail gfx of dbow spec.
setAnimation(1500); // set to 1501 if you dont want the floating up thing.It will float straight away.
}

Would love to upload a vid, but cant :\ Mopar dont support the format.
[/quote]
GRAVEDIGGED[/quote]

LOL. NOT. Well… true @ T3arful ;X They are in client. ;X

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1, topic:319135”][quote author=opaque link=topic=244891.msg2067037#msg2067037 date=1203515812]
i dont think anyone here knows about adding new emotes yet
[/quote]

Lol. Yes we do.

You guys just don’t know how.

@topic This looks nothing like the original.

Just looks like you added the gfx and used the god emote.[/quote]
Look at the date it was posted…
In 2008, nobody had really looked into taking animations from the new engine clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

[quote=“xD3ad, post:21, topic:183217”]Lol nice, grats to you for figuring out but it isnt the proper skillcape emote.
Animation = already in server.
GFX = fail gfx of Project Fubergen’s client in darkbow spec. here’s code for the damn thing.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“questcape”) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2740) //selfexplain.
{
stillgfx(643, absY, absX); // fail gfx of dbow spec.
setAnimation(1500); // set to 1501 if you dont want the floating up thing.It will float straight away.
}

Would love to upload a vid, but cant :\ Mopar dont support the format.[/quote]
K, two things;

  1. This was posted a year ago « on: February 20, 2008, 07:30:03 am »
  2. Animations aren’t ‘in the server’ they’re stored in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @xD3ad xD3ad
item.description:
@xD3ad wrote:

Lol nice, grats to you for figuring out but it isnt the proper skillcape emote.
Animation = already in server.
GFX = fail gfx of Project Fubergen’s client in darkbow spec. here’s code for the damn thing.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“questcape”) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2740) //selfexplain.
{
stillgfx(643, absY, absX); // fail gfx of dbow spec.
setAnimation(1500); // set to 1501 if you dont want the floating up thing.It will float straight away.
}

Would love to upload a vid, but cant :\ Mopar dont support the format.
